remarks: Lemma for ~ eulerth .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2014.)
statement:
eulerth.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( N e. NN /\ A e. ZZ /\ ( A gcd N ) = 1 ) ) $.
eulerth.2 $e |- S = { y e. ( 0 ..^ N ) | ( y gcd N ) = 1 } $.
eulerth.3 $e |- T = ( 1 ... ( phi ` N ) ) $.
eulerth.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : T -1-1-onto-> S ) $.
eulerth.5 $e |- G = ( x e. T |-> ( ( A x. ( F ` x ) ) mod N ) ) $.
eulerthlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A ^ ( phi ` N ) ) mod N ) = ( 1 mod N ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d S x $.
$d T x y $.
$d ph x y $.
